mapper.select: select distinct drug_group as drug_group from PDSCI.EDC_RANDOM_REC where proj_flow=#{projFlow} and record_status='Y'
update PDSCI.EDC_RANDOM_REC set org_flow=#{orgFlow} where proj_flow=#{projFlow} and record_status='Y' and block_num=#{blockNum}
update PDSCI.EDC_RANDOM_REC set org_flow='' where proj_flow=#{projFlow} and record_status='Y' and block_num=#{blockNum}
